lineage.Process: Merge 'ARIM Carajas_bifilar' C:\Users\elias.bernard\Documents\ArcGIS\Default.gdb\ARIMCarajas_bifilar_Merge "NOME "NOME" true true false 50 Text 0 0 ,First,#,ARIM Carajas_bifilar,Nome,-1,-1;TIPO "TIPO" true true false 50 Text 0 0 ,First,#,ARIM Carajas_bifilar,Tipo,-1,-1"

CalculateField arim_carajas_drenagem_bifilar_a TIPO strOutput VB "strInput = lcase([TIPO])
iPosition = 1
iSpace = ""
strOutput = ""
Do While InStr(iPosition, strInput, " ", 1) <> 0
 iSpace = InStr(iPosition, strInput, " ", 1)
 strOutput = strOutput & UCase(Mid(strInput, iPosition, 1))
 strOutput = strOutput & LCase(Mid(strInput, iPosition + 1, iSpace - iPosition))
 iPosition = iSpace + 1
 Loop
 strOutput = strOutput & UCase(Mid(strInput, iPosition, 1))
 strOutput = strOutput & LCase(Mid(strInput, iPosition + 1))
 strOutput = replace(strOutput , " Do "," do ")
 strOutput = replace(strOutput , " De "," de ")
 strOutput = replace(strOutput , " Da "," da ")
 strOutput = replace(strOutput , " Dos "," dos ")
 strOutput = replace(strOutput , " Ou "," ou ")
 strOutput = replace(strOutput , " Das "," das ")
 strOutput = replace(strOutput , " O "," o ")
strOutput = replace(strOutput , " Não "," não ")
strOutput = replace(strOutput , " E "," e ")
 strOutput = replace(strOutput , "Igarape","Igarapé")
"
